snippet: The New England Patriots on Wednesday urged a U.S. appeals court to reconsider its decision to reinstate Tom Brady's "Deflategate" four-game suspension, saying its star quarterback faced "unprecedented, unjustified and unsupported penalties."...
lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots on Wednesday urged a U.S. appeals court to reconsider its decision to reinstate Tom Brady's "Deflategate" four-game suspension, saying its star quarterback faced "unprecedented, unjustified and unsupported penalties."

headline.main: Patriots Back Tom Brady in 'Deflategate' Court Appeal
headline.print_headline: Patriots Back Tom Brady in 'Deflategate' Court Appeal
